title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. R, ch. I, pt. 602 - CAPITAL INVESTMENT
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. R, ch. I, pt. 602 - CAPITAL INVESTMENT
State Regulations
§ 602.1 - Gaming facility minimum capital investment

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. R, ch. I, pt. 602

Statutory authority: Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and

Breeding Law, §§ 1306[5], [6], 1315

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
